lom:description.lom:string:
Best practices from the NSF ADVANCE Program to increase the representation and advancement of women in academic science and engineering careers.
In an ideal world, everyone would work from nine in the morning until five in the evening. Real life is messier than that. Managing the balance between work and life is a constant tenuous. At times people have to take off time from their regular duties to tend to a new child or elder care. Or, someone may need for the issue of hiring their spouse before committing to a job. These issues are explored below in the following categories. Topics include: bullet Active And Modified Duties
* Dual Career
* Family Care
* General Resources
* Issues
* Pregnancy And Parenthood
* Resource Offices
* Stop The Clock.
